data.comment: The match has started at Weserstadion.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
In the minute 2, Robert Schroder signals a Bremen throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Bielefeld.
Bremen's Leonardo Bittencourt gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 2, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Weserstadion.
Bielefeld drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Robert Schroder awards the away team a throw-in.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Bremen are coming forward and Leonardo Bittencourt gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Robert Schroder awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Weserstadion.
In the minute 12, Robert Schroder signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Bremen's half.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 14, Bremen have a goal kick.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen.
Bremen pushes forward through Leonardo Bittencourt, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 18, In Bremen, Bremen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Bielefeld drives forward and Fabian Klos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bremen advance rapidly upfield but Robert Schroder blows for offside.
In the minute 24, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Bielefeld's Sergio Cordova is on target but unsuccessful.
Leonardo Bittencourt puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Jean-Manuel Mbom with an assist there.
In the minute 28, Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Bremen are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, Robert Schroder signals a Bremen throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Bielefeld.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Schroder awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bremen.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
Free kick Bremen.
In the minute 39, In Bremen, Ludwig Augustinsson (Bremen) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 40, Bielefeld are caught offside.
Marco Friedl is booked for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bielefeld are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, In Bremen, Manuel Prietl of Bielefeld is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Robert Schroder will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Schroder blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Bremen.
In the minute 47, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen.
Niclas Fullkrug (Bremen) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 48, Robert Schroder awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 52, At Weserstadion, Anderson Lucoqui has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Weserstadion.
In the minute 55, Free kick Bielefeld.
In Bremen Bielefeld attack through Marcel Hartel. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 57, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Throw-in Bremen.
Bielefeld's Ritsu Doan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bremen defender.
In the minute 60, Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Fabian Klos (Bielefeld) strikes at Weserstadion but his header is cleared.
In the minute 62, Robert Schroder signals a throw-in for Bielefeld, close to Bremen's area.
Sergio Cordova for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bremen have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Leonardo Bittencourt is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bremen's Leonardo Bittencourt is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 66, Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 69, Robert Schroder signals a Bremen throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Sergio Cordova with Sven Schipplock. This is the first substitution made today by Uwe Neuhaus.
The away team replace Anderson Lucoqui with Jacob Laursen.
In the minute 72, Bremen are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Bremen push upfield but Robert Schroder quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 74, Robert Schroder awards the home team a throw-in.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's first substitution at Weserstadion with Christian Gross replacing Davy Klaassen.
Bremen make their second substitution with Tahith Chong replacing Niclas Fullkrug.
In the minute 76, Free kick Bielefeld.
Bielefeld's Mike Van der Hoorn attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Bremen's Tahith Chong misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
In the minute 79, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Johannes Eggestein is replacing Leonardo Bittencourt for the home team.
Davie Selke is replacing Josh Sargent for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Bremen.
Can Bielefeld capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
Bielefeld push forward at Weserstadion and Sven Schipplock gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Bremen defence.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Bielefeld at Weserstadion.
Bremen drive upfield and Tahith Chong gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bielefeld defender.
Throw-in for Bremen close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Bremen will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bielefeld.
Reinhold Yabo is on a sub for Cebio Soukou for Bielefeld.
In the minute 88, Bielefeld make their fourth substitution with Joan Edmundsson replacing Ritsu Doan.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
The home team replace Jean-Manuel Mbom with Niklas Moisander.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Weserstadion.
At Weserstadion, Bremen are penalized for being offside.
At Weserstadion the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Bremen.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen.
Bielefeld needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milos Veljkovic is back on his feet again.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Bremen's Maximilian Eggestein has been booked in Bremen.
Mike Van der Hoorn for Bielefeld has been booked by Robert Schroder and receives a first yellow card.
The match at Weserstadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Milos Veljkovic, who is down injured.
